Posts.Content: hopeformom2019 wrote: Hi all, I am new to this forum. I am seeking any suggestion for my mom. My mom just got diagnostic with HR+ and Her2+ breast cancer stage 3. She just started her 1st chemo of Herceptin+ Paclitaxel yesterday. does anyone in here had been on drug? could you share your experience with me? Also do you know those drugs have any interaction with Fucodian supplement ( the japanese brown seaweed) . I bought that supplement for her to take with hope it can help her through the chemo time. Please share with me if you either in treatment with the same medicine or have you been taken fudocian during your treatment. Thank you so much for all suggestion and share. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Fucodian and Chemo interation hopeformom2019 ShetlandPony
